turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm doing fantastic. How are you on Friday?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: excited for the weekend, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need some coffee to get ready for tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds like a plan where did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order from from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which one whould you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's one in Napa on on Bel Air.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a probably a medium is good enough. So I want a medium sugar free caffè mocha with chocolate sauce and whipped cream. And I want that with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a medium sugar free caffe mocha with chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and whole milk from the peets on Bel Air in Napa.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, you got it all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set, it'll be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. How much was it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sweet. Can you add a tip for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure how much would you like to tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just throw in another buck, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, that makes it $6.23.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Super.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day, bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
